posts.post_title: FS T206 Cycle  John McGraw (Glove at Hip)  PSA 4(mk)
posts.post_content: Selling or Trade    PSA 4 (mk)   T206 Cycle  John McGraw  Glove at Hip--Cycle 460 back---Highest Graded by PSA and only one graded---Very Tough card to find-----I will sell at $1400 or Trade--Shipping is $12.00---Mailed Priority Mail with signature confirmation-Paypal or Check,  any questions, just email me, thanks,  Don
